num_tested_probands: The patient was referred to the movement disorders outpatient clinic at the age of 30 years, and genetic testing was performed.
No proband testing mentioned in the report.
num_positive_het_probands: No pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants were detected in the mitochondrial DNA. However, two biallelic variants in WARS2 were detected.
The patient is described as heterozygous for a pathogenic variant of WARS2, causing hyperkinetic movement disorder.
positive_phenotypes: The patient presented with a severe hyperkinetic movement disorder and cognitive deficits.
Phenotypes associated with the positive proband are listed in Table S1 and described in the clinical presentation video.
num_compound_or_double_hets: No compound or double heterozygous mutations were reported in the case report.
No compound or double heterozygous mutations mentioned in the report.
